candidate Profile Description.name: Dauhson Capps
candidate Profile Description.summary: Dedicated professional experienced in information technology, AI, hardware, software development, and networking. Skilled in providing technical assistance, troubleshooting, and process improvements. Pursuing a Master of Engineering in systems engineering to become a DevOps Engineer.

education.degree: Bachelor of Software Development, Software Development
Associate of Applied Science, Information Technology and Networking

experience.title: IT & Software Development
responsibilities: Managed local server projects and optimized a Python-based reporting system using pandas.
Administered two cloud instances on GCP and HiVelocity, including managing Atlassian Jira application for SOX compliance.
Maintained and updated the company website hosted on Microsoft 2012 server and Ubuntu machines.
Repaired and maintained 18 machines to ensure smooth operation of company applications in the shop.
Provided help desk support for MENA employees, managers, and the executive team.

experience.title: Intel AI Enabling Specialist
responsibilities: Assisted multimillion-dollar companies by enabling AI for their specific needs using the Intel AI Builder's program.
Covered 115 accounts and had weekly meetings with most concerning their enablement.
Learned basic principles of ML, AI, DL, Docker, and other types of data science.
Worked remotely and was responsible for own schedule.

core_competencies: Technical Skills: Windows, Mac OS, Linux OS, C#, Python, Flask, SCSS, JavaScript, React, Java, AI & ML concepts, Jira & Atlassian, Azure, AWS, GCP
